data.title: Sky Mobile to launch in Italy
data.meta_description: Sky and Fastweb have signed a distribution agreement that will see the launch of Sky Mobile in the Italian market early in 2024. Sky says that Sky Mobile Powered by Fastweb will offer customers a “reliable and fast service at an attractive price”. From launch, Sky Mobile will provide 5G services, thanks to the quality…
data.text:
Sky and Fastweb have signed a distribution agreement that will see the launch of Sky Mobile in the Italian market early in 2024.

Sky says that Sky Mobile Powered by Fastweb will offer customers a “reliable and fast service at an attractive price”.

From launch, Sky Mobile will provide 5G services, thanks to the quality of Fastweb’s mobile service, with 99% coverage in Italy according to Ookla.

“We are thrilled to announce the launch of Sky Mobile thanks to an agreement with Fastweb, technological partner also for Sky Wifi broadband, commented Andrea Duilio, CEO of Sky Italia. “After having entered the homes of millions of Italians with our exclusive contents and the ultra broadband of Sky Wifi, with the launch of Sky Mobile we want to complete our service offering by becoming a point of reference for Sky families and for all connectivity needs”.

“The partnership signed with Sky confirms the leading role of our fixed and mobile infrastructures”, added Walter Renna, CEO of Fastweb. “Thanks to this distribution agreement, our positioning on the mobile market is further strengthened”.

In addition to Sky Wifi, Sky Italy customers can also rent or purchase the Sky Glass integrated TV.
